  Source   Edit

boring utilities likely useful to multiple pieces of cps machinery

Types

ContinuationProc[T] = proc (c: T): T {.nimcall.}
  Source   Edit 
Continuation = concept c
    c.fn is ContinuationProc[Continuation]
    c is ref object
    c of RootObj
All continuation types must match this Continuation concept in order to be used by the .cps. macro.   Source   Edit 
NodeFilter = proc (n: NimNode): NimNode
  Source   Edit 
Pair = tuple[key: NimNode, val: NimNode]
  Source   Edit 
AstKind {.pure.} = enum
  Original = "original", Transformed = "transformed"
The type of the passed AST   Source   Edit 
Matcher = proc (n: NimNode): bool
A proc that returns whether a NimNode should be replaced   Source   Edit
